Title: We Need to Talk
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Rebecca Sugar, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: We Need to Talk: Greg tells Steven and Connie the story of how he learned about Gem fusion.
